title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for June 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here are the answers to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles today throughout June 2025. We'll also include the Fan Friday word during the week.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Stefani Adams, Pat Ralph, and Kelly Rushford. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 5. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, June 5, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – PICK A CARD, ANY CARD [Phrase] Tossup #1 – CHARMING HOSTESS [Person] Tossup #2 – SPILLING THE TEA [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #1 – PARTICIPATION TROPHY WIFE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – WINNING A FLYING CAR [The Next 50 Years] Regular Puzzle #3 – HAMMOCK BETWEEN TWO PALM TREES [Life’s A Beach] Tossup #3 – GOLD WATCH [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #4 – SILVER NECKLACE [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #5 – BRONZER [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – A NARROW ESCAPE [Thing] Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, June 4: Bonus Round Puzzle – ALIVE AND KICKING [Phrase] Tossup #1 – MAD SCIENTIST [Character] Tossup #2 – FAMILY REUNION [Event] Regular Puzzle #1 – MOMENTS, MEMORIES & MEMENTOS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – STANDING THE TEST OF TIME [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #3 – NO BETTER PLACE TO UNWIND [Phrase] Tossup #3 – TOP HAT AND TAILS [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #4 – BLACK TUXEDO [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #5 – CANADIAN TUXEDO [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – NOTHING BUT DANCE MUSIC [On My Playlist] Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, June 3: Bonus Round Puzzle – CAUSING AN UPROAR [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – HOLY MACKEREL! [Phrase] Tossup #2 – TRAVELING IN STYLE [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #1 – SOMEBODY’S WATCHING ME [Song Title] Regular Puzzle #2 – EGG ON YOUR FACE LIFT [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – THE PERFECT TEMPERATURE [Weather Report] Tossup #3 – BACK TO THE FUTURE [Movie Title] Tossup #4 – THE TIME MACHINE [Movie Title] Tossup #5 – HOT TUBE TIME MACHINE [Movie Title] Regular Puzzle #4 – DOLLAR SIGNS [Things] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, June 2: Bonus Round Puzzle – FLIPPING A HOUSE [Event] Tossup #1 – WHAT A RIDE [Phrase] Tossup #2 – PIN THE TAIL ON THE DONKEY [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – THE APPLE OF MY EYE [Food for Thought] Regular Puzzle #2 – SITTING FOR A CARICATURE [Say Cheese!] Regular Puzzle #3 – REFRESHING MOJITO [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – BEDROOM SUITE [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – HONEYMOON SUITE [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – WELL, ISN’T THAT SWEET [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE FINISH LINE [Thing] Regular Puzzle #5 – THE TIDE IS HIGH [Song Title] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, May 30: Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK GREYHOUND [Living Thing] Tossup #1 – BAHAMA MAMA [Happy Hour] Tossup #2 – COWBOY CARTER [On My Playlist] Regular Puzzle #1 – FLYING A SHARK-SHAPED KITE [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #2 – CAPTAIN AMERICA FERRERA [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – REJUVENATING HOT SPRINGS [Places] Tossup #3 – HARDWOOD FLOORS [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – KNOCK ON WOOD [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – I WOULD IF I COULD [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – AND THE REST IS HISTORY [Phrase] Fan Friday – LEGENDARY As usual, the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still live and we’ll share the Fan Friday word as part of the solutions above. Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway. For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
html:
Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Stefani Adams, Pat Ralph, and Kelly Rushford. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 5.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, June 5, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – PICK A CARD, ANY CARD [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – CHARMING HOSTESS [Person]
  • Tossup #2 – SPILLING THE TEA [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – PARTICIPATION TROPHY WIFE [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – WINNING A FLYING CAR [The Next 50 Years]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – HAMMOCK BETWEEN TWO PALM TREES [Life’s A Beach]
  • Tossup #3 – GOLD WATCH [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #4 – SILVER NECKLACE [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #5 – BRONZER [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – A NARROW ESCAPE [Thing]

Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, June 4:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ALIVE AND KICKING [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – MAD SCIENTIST [Character]
  • Tossup #2 – FAMILY REUNION [Event]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MOMENTS, MEMORIES & MEMENTOS [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – STANDING THE TEST OF TIME [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – NO BETTER PLACE TO UNWIND [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – TOP HAT AND TAILS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #4 – BLACK TUXEDO [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #5 – CANADIAN TUXEDO [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – NOTHING BUT DANCE MUSIC [On My Playlist]

Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, June 3:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – CAUSING AN UPROAR [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – HOLY MACKEREL! [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – TRAVELING IN STYLE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SOMEBODY’S WATCHING ME [Song Title]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – EGG ON YOUR FACE LIFT [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – THE PERFECT TEMPERATURE [Weather Report]
  • Tossup #3 – BACK TO THE FUTURE [Movie Title]
  • Tossup #4 – THE TIME MACHINE [Movie Title]
  • Tossup #5 – HOT TUBE TIME MACHINE [Movie Title]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – DOLLAR SIGNS [Things]

Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, June 2:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – FLIPPING A HOUSE [Event]
  • Tossup #1 – WHAT A RIDE [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – PIN THE TAIL ON THE DONKEY [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – THE APPLE OF MY EYE [Food for Thought]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – SITTING FOR A CARICATURE [Say Cheese!]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – REFRESHING MOJITO [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #3 – BEDROOM SUITE [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – HONEYMOON SUITE [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #5 – WELL, ISN’T THAT SWEET [Wordplay]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE FINISH LINE [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #5 – THE TIDE IS HIGH [Song Title]

Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, May 30:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK GREYHOUND [Living Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – BAHAMA MAMA [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #2 – COWBOY CARTER [On My Playlist]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – FLYING A SHARK-SHAPED KITE [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – CAPTAIN AMERICA FERRERA [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – REJUVENATING HOT SPRINGS [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – HARDWOOD FLOORS [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – KNOCK ON WOOD [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #5 – I WOULD IF I COULD [Wordplay]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – AND THE REST IS HISTORY [Phrase]
  • Fan Friday – LEGENDARY

As usual, the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still live and we’ll share the Fan Friday word as part of the solutions above. Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway.

For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
